nodes.text: Derango 4 was a hardscrabble astronomical object located in the galaxy. After Jake Farrell retired from being a flight instructor for the Galactic Empire, he briefly settled on Derango 4 before joining the rebel group Yellow Seven.
Derango 4 was first mentioned in the 2017 activity book Star Wars: A-wing Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model, written by Michael Kogge.
